title: Fragment, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Grid of withdrawn element with needle lace, reticella style,
                      plain weave
description: Linen ground with surface divided into squares. Square of needle lace alternates with square of plain linen. Each needle lace square encloses four spool-like motifs grouped around small central square.

                      plain weave. 1931-27-16.
